Reviews.Title: “good value”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: hotel city center five minute walk metro station connecting barcelona city center equipped reception helpful buffet breakfast fine costly euro hotel provide basics coffee croissant nominal cost tv catalan spanish speaking channels welcoming foreign visitors

Reviews.Title: “We liked it very much”
Reviews.Author: kojak149
Reviews.Content: friendly people professionality nice home wonderfull time barcelona hotel hope soon wellcome hotel colors thank marion andreas germany
